extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Samba
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Samba to the latest available version to ensure all security patches are applied.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable SMB1
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the use of SMB1 to enhance security and prevent vulnerabilities associated with older protocols.

cve_id: Samba Upgrade and SMB1 Disabling Recommendation
